key.description: Sets the [key] of the parameter. The [key] is the parameter name and will be used by other actions when calling this parameter.

value.description: Sets the [value] of the parameter. If this argument is provided, this plugin will ignore any element based value, even if element information was provided.

description: Saves a parameter under application parameters collection, which allows other actions to access and use the saved value. This action supports locators, elements, attributes, regular expressions and macros.

examples.description: Save [//tr[1]/td[2]] inner text into [first_name] application parameter.
examples.literalExample: register parameter {first_name} take element {//tr[1]/td[2]} inner text

examples.description: Save [//tr[1]/td[2]] inner text into [first_name] application parameter.
examples.literalExample: register parameter {{$ --key:first_name}} take element {//tr[1]/td[2]} inner text

examples.description: Save the href attribute value of [//tr[1]/td[6]/a[1]] into [link] application parameter.
examples.literalExample: register parameter {link} take element {//tr[1]/td[6]/a[1]} from {href} attribute

examples.description: Save the first match to [Abe] of element [//tr[1]/td[1]] inner text, into [regex] application parameter.
examples.literalExample: register parameter {regex} take element {//tr[1]/td[2]} inner text filter with {Abe} pattern

examples.description: Save the current date into [date] application parameter with [yyyy-MM-dd] format.

name: RegisterParameter

properties.argument: Parameter name. Please note, if the name already exists, the new call will override the existing value.
properties.onAttribute: The element attribute from which to extract information for action execution. If not specified, information will be taken from the element inner text.
properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.regularExpression: A pattern by which the extracted information will be evaluated. Returns the first match.

summary: Save a parameter under application parameters collection.
